scripts.delete:reports: rm mochawesome.json || true && del-cli --force runner-results && del-cli --force cypress/results/ && del-cli --force rm mochawesome-report/
scripts.report:make: yarn build && npx cypress run --browser=chrome --config-file config/cypress.config.js --reporter mochawesome --reporter-options reportDir=cypress/results,overwrite=false,html=false,json=true
scripts.report:build: npm run report:make && npm run report:merge && npx marge mochawesome.json
scripts.test: yarn build && npx cypress run --browser=chrome --config-file config/cypress.config.js
scripts.test:parallel: npm run cpConfig && yarn build && npx cypress-parallel -s cy:run  -t 2 -d cypress/e2e/ -a '--browser=chrome'
scripts.test:cucumber: npm run delete:cucumber:report && yarn build && npx cypress run --browser=chrome --config-file config/cypress.cucumber.config.js
scripts.test:report: npm run delete:reports && npm run report:build
